name: Coffee Mania (jiak1, zhiruiliu, Jetin, brandon220997)
description:
The Brew is Not Enough

Automate your way through Mundane Work!

This tycoon game will have the player running their own café operations and strategically improving their café. Improve coffee making times, add menu options, blaze through orders. Your café, your rules!

Controls

Left Click: Interact with Object

Left Click (Hold): Drag Object

A Key: Move Left

D Key: Move Right

Themes
  • Mundane
  • Automation
